TRINIUMCB.ToggleMidiRoll: Toggle MidiQOL Auto Roll + Fast Forward D20s
TRINIUMCB.GMScreenHeader: GM Screen (More settings are configurable from the GM screen itself)
TRINIUMCB.EndTurn: Your turn! Click here to end.
TRINIUMCB.SelectAllPlayerTokens: Select All Players. Doubleclick: All NPCs
TRINIUMCB.SelectRandomPlayerToken: Pick Random Token. None Selected: Pick Random Player

TCB_GMSCREEN.SettingsSaved: GM Screen settings have been successfully applied.
TCB_GMSCREEN.UnsupportedPageType: Trinium GM Screen doesn't support pagetype
TCB_GMSCREEN.EditorNote: Note: For convenience, the size of the preview window is equal to the size of the section you opened the editor from. Current column-row:
TCB_GMSCREEN.UnsavedChangesConfirmation: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
TCB_GMSCREEN.ReplaceJournalContent: This will replace all content with the Journal. Are you sure?
TCB_GMSCREEN.EditorHelpContent: Drag and Drop a Journal page to embed it into the editor. You can also drag and drop items and actors to create enrichers.
TCB_GMSCREEN.UnsupportedContentType: This type of content cannot be imported this way. You may try inserting it manually via UUID

TCB_SETTINGS.PrivacyButtonVisibilityHint: Select who can see the privacy buttons.
TCB_SETTINGS.EnablePrivacyButtonsHint: Enable or disable the roll privacy buttons.
TCB_SETTINGS.MidiButtonVisibilityHint: Select who can see the MidiQOL buttons.
TCB_SETTINGS.EnableMidiButtonsHint: Enable or disable the Midi QOL buttons.
TCB_SETTINGS.EnablePollingHint: Enable or disable polling to autoupdate MidiQOL button states when relative Midi keybindings are held down.
TCB_SETTINGS.PollingRateHint: Set the polling rate for checking MidiQOL button states (in milliseconds).
TCB_SETTINGS.EnableCombatTrackerButtonsHint: Enable or disable the combat tracker buttons.
TCB_SETTINGS.CombatTrackerButtonVisibilityHint: Select who can see the combat tracker buttons.
TCB_SETTINGS.HealthPrivacyHint: Select how much info about NPC Health players can see
TCB_SETTINGS.EnableCSSTweaksHint: Enable or disable custom CSS tweaks for a darker sidebar and reduced gaps.
TCB_SETTINGS.LogLevelHint: Set the log level for the logger.
TCB_SETTINGS.OnlyShowTurnControlsHint: Instead of the whole tracker, only show turn and combat control buttons
TCB_SETTINGS.StyleFoundryCombatTracker: Apply combatant styles to the Foundry Combat Tracker
TCB_SETTINGS.StyleFoundryCombatTrackerHint: Apply the following features also to the built-in combat tracker: Name hiding, Hidden Tokens, Disposition/Hidden/Defeated styles. May conflict with other modules.
TCB_SETTINGS.EnableGMScreenHint: Enable or disable the GM Screen button.
TCB_SETTINGS.GMScreenContentMenuHint: Edit the HTML content of the GM Screen
TCB_SETTINGS.NumberOfColumnsHint: Choose how many columns to display (1-4)
TCB_SETTINGS.DefaultColumnWidthHint: Set the width of each column (in pixels). A value above 200 is highly recommended
TCB_SETTINGS.GMScreenHeightHint: Set the height of the GM Screen in bottom mode (% of total screen height)
TCB_SETTINGS.GMScreenModeHint: Choose whether the screen expands from the left side of the screen, right side (left of sidebar) or bottom.
TCB_SETTINGS.GMScreenLeftMarginHint: Set the left margin of the GM Screen in bottom mode (in pixels)
TCB_SETTINGS.GMScreenRightMarginHint: Set the right margin of the GM Screen in bottom mode (in pixels)
TCB_SETTINGS.ExpandBottomModeHint: Enable to ignore the Default Column Width settings in Bottom Mode, expanding to fill all available horizontal space instead. Individual Column Width settings will still be respected.
TCB_SETTINGS.GMScreenLayoutHint: Configure the layout of the GM Screen
